verses.verse: Rejoice <WH8055> not, <WH408> O Israel, <WH3478> for <WH413> joy, <WH1524> as other people: <WH5971> for <WH3588> thou hast gone a whoring <WH2181> from <WH4480> <WH5921> thy God, <WH430> thou hast loved <WH157> a reward <WH868> upon <WH5921> every <WH3605> corn <WH1715> floor. <WH1637>
The floor <WH1637> and the winepress <WH3342> shall not <WH3808> feed <WH7462> them, and the new wine <WH8492> shall fail <WH3584> in her.

They shall not <WH3808> dwell <WH3427> in the LORD's <WH3068> land; <WH776> but Ephraim <WH669> shall return <WH7725> to Egypt, <WH4714> and they shall eat <WH398> unclean <WH2931> things in Assyria. <WH804>

They shall not <WH3808> offer <WH5258> wine <WH3196> offerings to the LORD, <WH3068> neither <WH3808> shall they be pleasing <WH6149> unto him: their sacrifices <WH2077> shall be unto them as the bread <WH3899> of mourners; <WH205> all <WH3605> that eat <WH398> thereof shall be polluted: <WH2930> for <WH3588> their bread <WH3899> for their soul <WH5315> shall not <WH3808> come into <WH935> the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>
What <WH4100> will ye do <WH6213> in the solemn <WH4150> day, <WH3117> and in the day <WH3117> of the feast <WH2282> of the LORD? <WH3068>

For, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> they are gone <WH1980> because of destruction: <WH4480> <WH7701> Egypt <WH4714> shall gather them up, <WH6908> Memphis <WH4644> shall bury <WH6912> them: the pleasant <WH4261> places for their silver, <WH3701> nettles <WH7057> shall possess <WH3423> them: thorns <WH2336> shall be in their tabernacles. <WH168>

The days <WH3117> of visitation <WH6486> are come, <WH935> the days <WH3117> of recompense <WH7966> are come; <WH935> Israel <WH3478> shall know <WH3045> it: the prophet <WH5030> is a fool, <WH191> the spiritual <WH7307> man <WH376> is mad, <WH7696> for <WH5921> the multitude <WH7230> of thine iniquity, <WH5771> and the great <WH7227> hatred. <WH4895>

The watchman <WH6822> of Ephraim <WH669> was with <WH5973> my God: <WH430> but the prophet <WH5030> is a snare <WH6341> of a fowler <WH3352> in <WH5921> all <WH3605> his ways, <WH1870> and hatred <WH4895> in the house <WH1004> of his God. <WH430>

They have deeply <WH6009> corrupted <WH7843> themselves, as in the days <WH3117> of Gibeah: <WH1390> therefore he will remember <WH2142> their iniquity, <WH5771> he will visit <WH6485> their sins. <WH2403>

I found <WH4672> Israel <WH3478> like grapes <WH6025> in the wilderness; <WH4057> I saw <WH7200> your fathers <WH1> as the firstripe <WH1063> in the fig tree <WH8384> at her first time: <WH7225> but they <WH1992> went <WH935> to Baal-peor, <WH1187> and separated themselves <WH5144> unto that shame; <WH1322> and their abominations <WH8251> were <WH1961> according as they loved. <WH157>

As for Ephraim, <WH669> their glory <WH3519> shall fly away <WH5774> like a bird, <WH5775> from the birth, <WH4480> <WH3205> and from the womb, <WH4480> <WH990> and from the conception. <WH4480> <WH2032>

Though <WH3588> <WH518> they bring up <WH1431> <WH853> their children, <WH1121> yet will I bereave <WH7921> them, that there shall not be a man <WH4480> <WH120> left: yea, <WH3588> woe <WH188> also <WH1571> to them when I depart <WH5493> from <WH4480> them!

Ephraim, <WH669> as <WH834> I saw <WH7200> Tyrus, <WH6865> is planted <WH8362> in a pleasant place: <WH5116> but Ephraim <WH669> shall bring forth <WH3318> his children <WH1121> to <WH413> the murderer. <WH2026>
Give <WH5414> them, O LORD: <WH3068> what <WH4100> wilt thou give? <WH5414> give <WH5414> them a miscarrying <WH7921> womb <WH7358> and dry <WH6784> breasts. <WH7699>

All <WH3605> their wickedness <WH7451> is in Gilgal: <WH1537> for <WH3588> there <WH8033> I hated <WH8130> them: for <WH5921> the wickedness <WH7455> of their doings <WH4611> I will drive them out <WH1644> of mine house, <WH4480> <WH1004> I will love <WH157> them no <WH3808> more: <WH3254> all <WH3605> their princes <WH8269> are revolters. <WH5637>

Ephraim <WH669> is smitten, <WH5221> their root <WH8328> is dried up, <WH3001> they shall bear <WH6213> no <WH1077> fruit: <WH6529> yea, <WH1571> though <WH3588> they bring forth, <WH3205> yet will I slay <WH4191> even the beloved <WH4261> fruit of their womb. <WH990>
My God <WH430> will cast them away, <WH3988> because <WH3588> they did not <WH3808> hearken <WH8085> unto him: and they shall be <WH1961> wanderers <WH5074> among the nations. <WH1471>
